title: `minContains` without `contains` is meaningless
description: `minContains` has no effect unless a `contains` schema is also provided.

comprehensiveExamples.title: Wrong: minContains without contains
comprehensiveExamples.description: minContains has no effect without a contains schema.

comprehensiveExamples.title: Right: contains with minContains
comprehensiveExamples.description: Pair minContains with contains to constrain matching elements.
